name: The World Cup Moment Series V2

metadata.name: CR7's Stunning Hat-trick, 2018, Anime Remix
metadata.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's Stunning Hat-trick In Ibérian Derby, 2018, Anime Remix. This NFT not only bring fans the special memories, but also allocate real benefits to fans via blind box model. Purchasers of the NFTs will get one item from the following: the exclusive FIFA PANINI player trading card, the special moment's Kraze Football T-shirt, Kraze Mascot Doll, Kraze Football player action figure, etc. Please contact service@krazefootball.com for shipping & handling. Visit https://krazefootball.com for more details.
